item.title: Understanding Places of Interest
item.description: Urban Informatics is a field of study based strictly on the urban environment and more specifically, cities.

item.title: Introducing the urban data collective
item.description: The urban data collective (name under construction) was borne out of a desire to create an easy and non-academic resource for the field of urban informatics.

item.title: A State of Being
item.description: Studying Covid-19’s Effect on Community Vulnerability in Massachusetts The Covid-19 crisis has exposed the weak hidden foundations upon which our ‘prosperous’ society was built, and exacerbated visible ones.
